falconHeavy.title: Falcon Heavy Platform
falconHeavy.subtitle: Subscription-based group management and administrative tools
falconHeavy.short: A full-stack platform for subscription handling, payments, and location-based group management.
highlights: Scalable backend built with Fastify and Bull workers for background processing
Integrated Google Maps for dynamic group and administrative visualization
Role-based access, subscription management, and secure payment flow
description: Falcon Heavy is a full-stack web platform designed to manage subscription-based groups and administrative workflows. It combines a modular Fastify API with React-powered interfaces and integrates background jobs using Bull and Redis.
The system supports payment processing, privilege-based group creation, subscription management, and administrative dashboards optimized for large datasets.
The platform also integrates Google Maps to provide location-aware group visualization and real-time administrative insights.

creditcloser.title: Creditcloser Loan Management System
creditcloser.subtitle: Web application for loan creation, debtor notifications, and full administrative control.
creditcloser.short: A full loan management platform with automated notifications, reporting, and a powerful admin panel.
highlights: Automated debtor notifications using dynamic templates and scheduling
Full administrative panel for managing loans, users, and communication settings
Secure authentication using Passport and Redis-backed sessions
description: The Creditcloser application is a full-featured loan management system designed to streamline financial operations for administrators. It provides tools to create loans, manage users, and automate borrower notifications.
The frontend includes a React-powered admin dashboard built with Material UI and React Admin, enabling efficient handling of loan data, users, payments, and monthly profit reports.

The backend integrates Express, PostgreSQL, Sequelize, and Redis to implement secure authentication, automated email workflows using SendGrid and Handlebars, and scheduled reporting tasks via node-cron.
The system also includes infrastructure-level tooling such as Docker, Nginx, and AWS services to ensure reliable deployment and smooth performance.

ndaB2BCommerce.title: NDA B2B Commerce Platform
ndaB2BCommerce.subtitle: Full-stack multi-role B2B commerce system with advanced inventory, ordering, and administrative capabilities.
ndaB2BCommerce.short: A large-scale NDA B2B commerce platform with complex business roles, multi-country structure, and full administrative control.
description: This NDA-protected project is a large B2B commerce platform operating across multiple regions and user roles. The system manages complex purchasing workflows, administrative controls, inventory interactions, and large data sets. The solution includes a powerful internal dashboard used by various business units.

The project includes long-term maintenance and iterative development of new features. Work involves architectural updates, performance improvements, debugging complex business logic, and implementing new internal tools requested by the client.

ndaHealthCoach.title: NDA Full-Stack Platform
ndaHealthCoach.subtitle: A large-scale full-stack application with AI features, multi-role access, and complex data processing.
ndaHealthCoach.short: A multi-module platform combining real-time features, data ingestion pipelines, and interactive visualization components.
highlights: Automated processing workflows for large unstructured datasets
Integration with several external APIs for continuous data synchronization
Advanced visualization modules including 3D and timeline-based interfaces
Role-based system with a configurable administrative panel
description: This NDA-protected project is a full-stack platform consisting of multiple integrated modules, real-time communication features, and automated data workflows. The system handles high-volume data ingestion from various external services and processes it through background tasks and structured pipelines.
